attributes.action: To freeze all household gas and electricity prices forthwith
attributes.additional_details:
To the British government:
We the undersigned note that household gas and electricity prices have been increased substantially in 2008, even though wholesale prices were no higher than at the beginning of 2006.
We also note the enormous profits being made by the main supply companies and that nearly half of this money is handed to shareholders.
Southern Electricity in their wisdom have decided to increase their prices 8.2% from 15th November 2013, the new tarrif for gas increasing to 5.57p per kwh inc vat  and tarrif for electricity increasing to 17.24p per kwh inc vat.
We ask the Government to freeze all fuel prices forthwith until at least summer 2017 and end the surcharge on all pre-payment meters.
